name: PopupMenuTheme
desc: An inherited widget that defines the configuration for popup menus in this widget's subtree.

fields.name: data
fields.desc: The properties for descendant popup menu widgets.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of PopupMenuTheme
desc: You can specify the PopupMenuThemeData properties to set default styles for descendant PopupMenuButton components, such as shape, elevation, color, text style, etc. You can also use PopupMenuTheme.of to obtain the theme data of PopupMenu.
